chafe.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if a part of your body chafes or if something chafes it, it becomes sore because of something rubbing against it
chafe.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Wear a T-shirt under your wet suit to stop it chafing.
chafe.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Some hunters are chafing under the new restrictions.
chafe.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: to rub part of your body to make it warm
